snippet: SIMON--Bess. A beautiful human being, fantastic sister, fantastic tanta, fantastic cousin and loyal friend. She will be missed. UJA Speakers Bureau (1946-1992). Funeral at the Plaza Jewish Community Chapel on Sunday, March 27th at 10am. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SIMON--Bess. A beautiful human being, fantastic sister, fantastic tanta, fantastic cousin and loyal friend. She will be missed. UJA Speakers Bureau (1946-1992). Funeral at the Plaza Jewish Community Chapel on Sunday, March 27th at 10am. 1/3
